topic.title: SAMPLE ANTIBIOTIC SENSITIVITY RESULT (SNOMED CT DM+D)
topic.shortdesc: SAMPLE ANTIBIOTIC SENSITIVITY RESULT (SNOMED CT DM+D) is the SNOMED CT® concept ID from the NHS Dictionary of Medicines and Devices which is used to identify the antibiotics to which a culture SAMPLE is sensitive (i.
